title: (x) "PROCESS" sans serif used by Diego Fellay - Fedra Sans {Roland Stieger}
content:
Happy New Year all,

wondering about the font used in the image below. I especially like the ’kicking’ R.

Thanks in advance,

Seb

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103075553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/P600x400-00813_5189.png)
author: all about seb

comments.content:
